bibl.title: A strategos on Trial before the Provincial Governor: a New Look at a Petition to the Roman Prefect of Egypt (P.Wisc. I 33)
bibl.seg: Anna Dolganov, A strategos on Trial before the Provincial Governor: a New Look at a Petition to the Roman Prefect of Egypt (P.Wisc. I 33).

P. Wisc. I, 33: new edition, translation and commentary. Arsinoite nome, after 19 October 147. - Pp. 385-391: Appendix. Table of events during the στρατηγία of Theon, as documented by the archive of Ptolemaios and other papyri.
bibl.note: P. Wisc. I, 33: new edition, translation and commentary. Arsinoite nome, after 19 October 147. - Pp. 385-391: Appendix. Table of events during the στρατηγία of Theon, as documented by the archive of Ptolemaios and other papyri.
